alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 2:15PM CDT until August 26 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Warning for... Southwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 1000 PM CDT Thursday. * At 215 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated that rain intensity had decreased over southeastern Mobile and southwestern Baldwin counties. However, a large area of light to occasionally moderate rain continues. Many roads, creeks, and streams in southeastern Mobile and southwestern Baldwin counties remain flooded from earlier excessive rainfall and inundation flooding is expected to continue into this evening. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gulf Shores, Foley, Orange Beach, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Dauphin Island, Magnolia Springs, Bon Secour, Elberta, Fort Morgan, Alabama Port, Coden, Barnwell, Turkey Branch, Gulf Highlands, Gasque, River Park, Marlow, Faustinas and Mon Louis.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
